short_summary: Testing for Fumigants and Solvents at Peace Bridge Commercial Operations
description: perform testing for fumigants and solvents in cargo containers at Peace Bridge Commercial Operations
full_summary:
### Testing for Fumigants and Solvents at Peace Bridge Commercial Operations

#### Reference Number: cb-6827-51419786
#### Solicitation Number: 1000415196
#### Publication Date: 2023-06-29
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-25T14:00:00

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites vendors to submit proposal for testing for fumigants and solvents at the Peace Bridge Commercial Operations in Fort Erie, Ontario.

**Location:**
Opérations commerciales du pont Peace, 10 Queen Street, Fort Erie, Ontario, L2A 5N7

The BSOS examine marine cargo containers upon their arrival to the Land Border Ports of Entry for various reasons, including air quality within the containers. Therefore, identifying chemical components such as fumigants and solvents in the containers is a high priority.

**Contract Information:**
- **Duration:** The contract may last from the Contract date until March 31, 2024, inclusive, with a possibility of extension by up to five (5) additional one-year periods.
- **Security Requirements:** There are no security requirements applicable to the contract.

**Technical Requirements:**
 Successful applicants must possess expertise in identifying chemical components in marine cargo containers, including fumigants and solvents.

**How to Respond:**
 Interested vendors may obtain more information by referencing the solicitation documents on [CanadaBUs site (https://canadabuys.canada.ca)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

Please be sure to submit your proposal by the tender closing date and time mentioned above.

**Important Contacts:**
- Contact Name: Yuqiao Hu
- Contact Email address: [yuqiao.hu@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:yuqiao.hu@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca) 
- Contact Phone: [None]
- Contact Address: [None]
